Osa Conservation: Tracker Checker Part 1 Tracker status checker
Osa Conservation: Tracker Checker Chris Beirne Part 1 Tracker status checker This document summarize the movement locations for all active collars within Osa Conservation’s OC Vultures project.

1.1 Costa Rica check-in Map # Get missed locations checkin_locs <- read_sheet("1pPsmKoMSDJI7_BVVQAlT6ZrHROXSe0tZRxvn0RIOQK8") ## ✔ Reading from "eObs_checkin_locations". ## ✔ Range 'Sheet1'. checkin_locs <- as.data.frame(checkin_locs) checkin_locs$timestamp <- with_tz(checkin_locs$timestamp, tz="America/Costa_Rica") # Add a country column checkin_locs$country <- checkin_locs$location_lat<0 checkin_locs$country[checkin_locs$country==T] <- "peru" checkin_locs$country[checkin_locs$country==F] <- "costa_rica" #table(checkin_locs$country) # Add a country column dat$country <- dat$location_lat<0 dat$country[dat$country==T] <- "peru" dat$country[dat$country==F] <- "costa_rica" # New map ids <- tmp_cr_shp$local_identifier local_identifiers <- sub('\\_.*', '', tmp_cr_shp$local_identifier) i <- 24 m <- leaflet() %>% # Add a satellite image layer addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.PositronNoLabels, group="Simple") %>% addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery, group="Satellite") %>% addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap.Mapnik, group="OS") #%>% for (i in seq(along=ids)) { m <- m %>% addPolylines(data = tmp_cr_shp[i,], color = tmp_cr_shp$colours[i], group = ids[i], weight=2,opacity=0.3) %>% addCircleMarkers(lng=checkin_locs$location_long[checkin_locs$local_identifier==ids[i]], lat=checkin_locs$location_lat[checkin_locs$local_identifier==ids[i]], popup=paste(checkin_locs$timestamp[checkin_locs$local_identifier==ids[i]]), fillOpacity = 1, opacity = 1, radius=3, color = "red", group = ids[i], stroke=F) } m <- m %>% #addLegend(position= "topright", colors=tmp_cr_shp$colours, # labels=local_identifiers ,opacity = 0.7, title = "Animals") %>% addScaleBar(position="topleft", options=scaleBarOptions(maxWidth = 100, metric = TRUE, imperial = FALSE, updateWhenIdle = TRUE)) %>% addLayersControl( baseGroups = c("OS", "Simple", "Satellite"), overlayGroups = ids, options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE) ) %>% addFullscreenControl() m
